title: Weed Control Work Record
description: A work for a weed control job for a field

id.description: The unique identifier of the record

fieldId.description: The id of the field that the work has been done on

date.description: The date when the work has been done

coverage.description: The percentage of field area covered by the weed control job

numberOfWeedsDetected.description: The number of weeds detected during the weed control job

numberOfWeedsRemoved.description: The number of weeds removed during the weed control job

distance.description: The distance driven by the machine of the weed control job
